title: Trigger's Development Status
desc: Below are the tools/programs/etc that trigger_death is working on creating, updating, or fixing. Order changes often and without warning.

working.title: Ability to ban users from using Triggy
working.desc: Abuse the bot, you lose the bot.

working.title: Until rapid/heavy eye blinking gets better
working.desc: I've been dealing with this since October, but it's been getting significantly worse lately. It is definitely a tick of some kind but I just pray it's nother *another* focal dystonia affliction.

backlog.title: TriggersTools.ILPatching
backlog.desc: A patcher library for use with [Terraria Rupee Replacer](https://github.com/trigger-death/TerrariaRupeeReplacer) and [Terraria Item Modifier](https://github.com/trigger-death/TerrariaItemModifier) patchers

backlog.title: Terraria Item Modifier
backlog.desc: Support to co-exist with Terraria Patcher

backlog.title: Grisaia Sprite Viewer
backlog.desc: Extract sprites from Grisaia games and display them with all the parts combined

backlog.title: WinDirStat.NET
backlog.desc: C# implementation of WinDirStat with a more responsive and cleaner UI

backlog.title: TriggersTools.SteinsGate.Divergence
backlog.desc: Stop using static property settings for Divergence Drawer, this breaks async

backlog.title: TriggersTools.Asciify
backlog.desc: Apply fixes used in triggy's Asciify library

backlog.title: RCT2 Tools
backlog.desc: Upgrade to WPF, cleanup the UI, and reintroduce the Steam Stub
